name: Astro Remote
description:
Astro Remote is a free companion app for Astro Duel. Pilot your ship wirelessly using an iPhone or iPod Touch. Connect more iPhones for more players.

- Connect the iPhone to the same WiFi network as your iPad or Apple TV.
- On the player select screen, press the A button to join the game.

====================================

Astro Duel is a competitive local multiplayer game for iPad, Apple TV, PC and Mac.

Inspired from endless nights of Super Bomberman, rounds are quick and death is sudden. 2 to 4 ships blast each other using asteroid-style ships. The goal: KILL KILL KILL!!
